content:
That sounds like a great idea! Adding chickpeas to the Gomen Be Sega will definitely boost the protein content and make it a more filling dish. And I'm glad I could help with the tips on working with gochugaru. Korean chili flakes can be quite potent, so it's important to use them wisely.

Remember to have fun and experiment with different ingredients and spices to make the dishes your own. And don't be afraid to try new things and step out of your comfort zone. That's the best way to learn and grow as a cook.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you enjoy making and devouring your delicious Gomen Be Sega and Korean BBQ-style dishes!
